text:
On a super hot July evening, a young guy stepped out of his cramped attic room in S. Place. He walked slowly, like he wasn't sure where to go, heading toward K. Bridge. 

He had just dodged his landlady on the stairs. His attic felt more like a cupboard than a real room. The landlady, who gave him a place to stay, meals, and some help, lived right below him.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** A young man hesitates as he leaves his cramped garret on a hot July evening.
